text: Tessa Carvalho (born 13 December 1966) is a former synchronized swimmer from Brazil. She competed in both the women's solo and women's duet competitions at the . Tessa's sister is Paula Carvalho, who was her partner in the women's duet at the 1984 Summer Olympics. == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian synchronized swimmers Category:Olympic synchronized swimmers of Brazil Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1984 Summer Olympics
title: Tessa Carvalho
